doc:
Monty Banks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Banks 0 Montague (Monty) Banks (15 July 1897 [registered on 18 July 1897] – 7 January 1950 born Mario Bianchi) was an Italian comedian and film director who achieved success in the United Kingdom and in the US. Montague ( Monty ) Banks ( 15_July_1897_[ registered on 18_July_1897_] – 7_January_1950 born Mario_Bianchi ) was an_Italian_comedian_and_film_director who achieved success in the_United_Kingdom and in the_US .
